reviewText: This DVD was presented as an educational tool. It is actually an infomercial with nothing substantive to help a person negotiate a marriage or any other relationship. Do not buy it!
This was not a good product.  Just clips from a TV spot with no real skills or depth.  And the weird interview with the Fords did not really fit my idea of the video.

Need I say more?

I've constantly wondered why I'm in the same relationship...different face...over and over.  It gets exhausting!

This DVD is fantastic in that Harville Hendrix explains why we choose our lovers and then you have successful married people providing advice about infidelity, fights and so much more.
This DVD will open your eyes! The advice on relationships and the explanations about the patterns we are all in is amazing!
Harville's DVD is a great resource for anyone looking for more in their relationships (I think that includes all of us!)  The advice on improving communication is fantastic.
